name: Blight; or The Dreams that Bind Us - Chapter 1
name_original: Blight; or The Dreams that Bind Us - Chapter 1
description:
Blight; or The Dreams that Bind Us is a story focused RPG game. As you play the game the main story will change depending on the choices you make (whether you know you are making them or not). Rather than focusing specifically on "multiple endings" with specific paths like other games, Blight focuses on affecting the story as you experience it with paths that constantly intertwine. Events may or may not occur depending on decisions you make, and dialogue between characters  can change depending what those characters have done or seen. Changes can also affect things that happen later or even open up more options that also affect game play.

The main idea is that multiple people can play this game and have very different experiences while at the same time experiencing the same story. For example: "Remember when you went to this place and met this character?" Someone else may have played differently and not encountered those things at all! This promotes exploration and replayability to uncover deeper truths and discover new pieces of information about the story. (Be careful of how deep you dig however. You may not like what you find hidden within the truth of Blight.)

Be sure to share this game with your friends and see how the story unfolds for them! This is only 1 chapter, and there is obviously more story to tell. If this game reaches any sort of demand for that I would love to continue working on it. In any case, I hope you enjoy it!

Featuring music by CrazyGroupTrio.

NOTE: This game does use assets created by other creators that have publicly allowed them to be used for non-commercial means. These creators have been credited accordingly. However if you are the creator of any of these assets and you do not wish it to be part of this game, please contact me and I will remove them.
